item.title: Branches overhanging my property, 22nd August
item.description:
Can you please send your contractors back to prune this tree properly. You can quite clearly see the branches over hanging my drive. The fruit falls on my car and driveway causing a mess also the fruit are a hazard. I would be very grateful if you can do this asap.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bourne Road, Widmore, London

item.title: Lots of litter. THE ROAD NEEDS TO BE SWEPED ASP. Also a large container has been dumped and needs to be removed. Thank you, 22nd August
item.description:
The road hasn't been sweeped/ cleaned for THREE days. This is a ongoing problem on Furrow lane!!! Can you please send a road sweeper to clean the road. Its really bad. There is also a problem with your website I am unable to upload photos.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Furrow Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bicycle dumped in Cochrane Mews, 22nd August
item.description:
This bicycle makes it impossible for me to drive in and out of my garage. Next to where to bic has been abandoned. It is secured to a pipe outside my flat. No vehicle can get passed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Cochrane Mews, St. John's Wood, London
